scope: Requirements resolution via index+library (Option-B inheritance-ready tree)
Registry-driven evaluation keys allow-list (+ SID union)
non_goals: No adaptive requirement shifting unless enterprise lys curve explicitly enabled
analyzer.intent: Analyzer-only: parse → resolve aliases → load ingredients → load requirements → compute nutrients → PASS/WARN/FAIL; no optimization.

guardrails.enterprise_lys_curve_gating: If enterprise.lys_curve.enabled === true then require performance inputs; otherwise do not guess.
